wizard chess    10 years after release people are still playing this game  i found it recently and im having a blast  tricky with some op moves looking at you gooey blob and magic bolt and once one player starts winning it can be hard to catch them  but evenly matched games that go backandforth are exciting and fantastically fun for me  theres even a league  still active
it seems like an ok game for what it is but it didnt really do much to keep me interested from the beginning  also like 90 of the achievements are based on multiplayer criteria which is disappointing
it is a fun game though i wish it had an option for starting over from the beginning  oh well
great game to play with friends keep coming back years later
i do like the music but the game is way to slow and boring to play
